name: Buhler Industries Inc.
longDescription: Buhler Industries Inc is engaged in the manufacturing of agricultural equipment. Its factories located in Morden and Winnipeg and Vegreville and Willmar, build tractors, sprayers, front-end loaders, augers, snowblowers, mowers, seeding and tillage equipment, and compact implements. Its brand portfolio comprises Farm King, Ezee-On, Allied, Inland, and Versatile. Also, the company maintains several well-stocked parts warehouses. Its geographical segments are Canada, the United States, CIS(Commonwealth of Independent States), and others. The company derives a majority of its revenue from the United States.
